abolish.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to officially end a law, system etc, especially one that has existed for a long time
abolish.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Slavery was abolished in the US in the 19th century.
abolish.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to officially end a law, a system for doing something, an organization etc, especially one that has existed for a long time
abolish.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Inheritance tax in Bulgaria was abolished in 2005.
